meta_to_img_path[source]

meta_to_img_path(meta_file, img_bank='images/')

Suggest the image file that corresponds with an annotation CSV file

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
meta_to_img_path('annotations/06241902_proc_00023.csv')

PosixPath('images/06241902_proc_00023.png')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

meta_to_mask_path[source]

meta_to_mask_path(meta_file, mask_dir='masks/')

provides name for segmentation mask file

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
meta_to_mask_path('annotations/06241902_proc_00023.csv')

PosixPath('masks/06241902_proc_00023_P.png')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

fix_abangle[source]

fix_abangle(a, b, angle)

Makes sure semimajor axis > semiminor axis, and angles are consistent

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fix_abangle(5,10,-20)

(10, 5, 70)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

draw_ellipse[source]

draw_ellipse(img, center, axes, angle, startAngle=0, endAngle=360, color=0, thickness=2, lineType=16, shift=10, filled=False)

"Draws an ellipse into image. startAngle & endAngle should are arc-angles. They should stay at 0 & 360 for full ellipses.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
height, width = 512,384
img = np.zeros((width, height), dtype=np.uint8)  # numpy w/h is "backwards" to images
img = draw_ellipse(img, (100,100), (80,30), 45, color=100, filled=True)
{% endraw %}
